    • Method Detail

      • getI18nKey

        @Nullable
public static String getI18nKey(@Nonnull
                                          Labeled node)
        Finds out if an i18n key has been registered with the target Node, returning the key if found.
        Parameters:
        node - the target node on which the key may have been registered.
        Returns:
        the key registered with the target Node or null if not found.
        Since:
        2.9.0

      • setI18nArgs

        public static void setI18nArgs(@Nonnull
                               Labeled node,
                               @Nullable
                               String args)
        Associates an i18n arrays of arguments to a node. These arguments will be used alongside a key to resolve a message via the application's MessageSource.
        Parameters:
        node - the target node on which the key will be registered.
        args - the array of arguments to be registered.
        Since:
        2.9.0
